content:
President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky announced the first meeting of the rate of the Supreme Commander, whose convocation was responsible for the new NSDC secretary Alexander Litvinenko.

He is about itreportedIn telegrams.

“Russian terrorists beat Ukrainian energy again. Prime Minister Denis Shmigal, Energy Minister Herman Galushchenko, Chairman of the Board of Ukrenergo and Naftogaz Volodymyr Kudrytsky and Alexey Chernyshov reported on the damage and restoration work. They discussed the most effective ways of physical protection and their introduction on other sites, ”said Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

The President added that this night the Kaniv and Dniester hydroelectric power plants became the conscious goals of the enemy, emphasizing that the terrorist country wants to repetition an ecological catastrophe in Kherson region.

“But now not only Ukraine but also Moldova is threatened. The water will not stop in front of the border pillars, as the Russian war does not stop, if together and in time not to stop it in Ukraine, ”he stressed.

The second important issue of the rate were contracts for the supply of weapons and ammunition in the near future and for the future.

“There was a need for air defense. Due to the intensity of Russian shelling, it is necessary to replenish the stocks faster. He instructed to strengthen work with partners. We are counting on their rapid reaction, ”the Head of State said.

As reported by the Armyinform, President of Ukraine Volodymyr ZelenskyystatedOn updating the work of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine and identified the main tasks.
title: The President has staged: discussed the protection of energy facilities and weapons supply contracts
